content: --तर्पणं {1} an oblation to the Manes. {2} the act of throwing water out of the right hand (as at the time of ablutions) as an offering to the Manes or deceased ancestors; <ls>Ms. 2. 176.</ls> {3} sesamum. {4} gifts given at Śrāddhas or funeral rites. {5} the part of the hand between the thumb and the fore finger (sacred to the Manes.).
